name: The Cult Below
description:

Background

In 2020, America was in a state of rage. Companies saw an opportunity to leverage the public’s anger for maximum profit. They worked at both ends… staging tragedies and then speaking out against what they created. The plan backfired and caused society to collapse. The United States government was overthrown by rioters. In the following days, the riots spread worldwide and the global economy failed. The world shifted to a state of Anarchy. Violent murders and large-scale destruction killed most of the global population. Although tragic, not all was lost. A group of doomsday preppers built an underground bunker to survive. It started as a stable society and then quickly shifted to a cult. The leader ordered everyone to worship The Great One. Eventually, the preppers constructed a church to conduct rituals. Life was prosperous for the cult until a member failed to perform a human sacrifice. You awake after the tragic event. Discover what happened and escape from the bunker.
